title: Food and Drinks 1
sentences: I normally have coffee and toast for breakfast.
What time are we going to eat lunch today?
I like to have something light for dinner like a salad.
The red apple is my favorite fruit.
Do you want a glass of cold water?
de esta panadería es muy rico.
The bread from this bakery is very tasty.
I put a little milk in my tea.
Do you prefer roasted or fried chicken?
I eat a salad with tomato and lettuce.
con pollo es un plato muy común.
Rice with chicken is a very common dish.
Do you like strong or mild cheese?
I need to buy a dozen eggs.
fresco es muy bueno para la salud.
Fresh fish is very good for health.
I am very hungry; can we eat already?
I drink an orange juice every morning.
Do you want some sugar for the coffee?
The soup is very hot; be careful.
es un ingrediente básico para la salsa.
The tomato is a basic ingredient for the sauce.
Are you thirsty? There is water in the fridge.
de ternera es bastante cara hoy.
The beef meat is quite expensive today.
I use olive oil for cooking.
es una fruta muy práctica para llevar.
The banana is a very practical fruit to carry.
French fries (fried potatoes) are my favorite.
